name: Agile Startup UI KIT - Product Preview
description:
Get your new site done in hours


Spend less time creating your website using the aGile UI Kit, without compromising its quality. Extra time for the things that really matter to you. We offer premium design tools to build and customize your website, followed by a modern code framework.


Download Available now on Gumroad


Highlights

  • Fully Customizable
  • 25+ Sections
  • Light & Dark Theme
  • Desktop and Mobile
  • Responsive Design
  • Made with Figma


Font used (not included)

Roobert (https://displaay.net/typeface/roobert-collection/roobert/)

Roobert is a paid font and it's not included in the product.


Who is it for?


Startups

  • Technology
  • Health Tech
  • FinTech
  • EdTech
  • Saas business
  • Logistics


Tech

  • Tech Startups
  • Tech Companies
  • Tech Consultancy
  • Tech Agencies


Design

  • Design Studios
  • Design Consultancy
  • Design Agencies
  • Advertising Agencies



Includes:

Pages and Sections

Save time and build websites with well-organized and customizable sections on Figma.

Layout templates

Kickstart your project with ready-to-use layout templates.

Light and dark theme

Two themes in one pack. Pick your favorite and build your project faster.

Free future updates

All important updates from this UI Kit or Figma will land in the UI kit for free.
